first_para: Danny Kennedy MLA (born 6 July 1959) is a unionist politician in Northern Ireland a former deputy leader of the Ulster Unionist Party (UUP) Assembly Group and current Minister for Regional Development.

full.extract: Danny Kennedy MLA (born 6 July 1959) is a unionist politician in Northern Ireland a former deputy leader of the Ulster Unionist Party (UUP) Assembly Group and current Minister for Regional Development.
full.title: Danny Kennedy
